fullplot: Based on a real life group of con artists who pulled off many clever robberies during 1980s, and robbed famous businessmen and politicians by pretending to be the CBI or Income tax officers and conducting raids, on the pretext of conducting raids they would take away all the black money hoarded by them.
plot: A gang of thieves robs famous businessmen and politicians by posing as income tax officers.
title: Special 26
